Articles.Content:
I just updated and I can't get Smart SAS to work.

My last backup of the saves folder is more than 2 weeks old and if I try the new saves folder in v1.0.4 it says it is incompatible.

Do you know any solution other than just playing without MechJeb?

Thanks!

It looks like the developer is fixing the issues: https://github.com/MuMech/MechJeb2/tree/dev shows some commits re: 1.0.5 issues.

I'm sure that a new release will come out soon that is compatible.
Thank you iterion! I didn't know about that Github repository
It not like the first post in the MJ thread points to the temporary 1.0.5 release...
Why don't I have the manual/ascent guidance module in MechJeb? And a whole raft of other things mentioned in the online manual?

Why don't I have the manual/ascent guidance module in MechJeb? And a whole raft of other things mentioned in the online manual?

Not sure, but you would probably be better off asking in the actual mechjeb thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124336-PART-1-0-4-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-5-3-%28July-6th%29-1-0-5-in-there-too
